transcript: the most valuable things that you can do to move your career forward is to network is to find people who are ahead of you who can give you the steps and say hey watch out for that puddle hey watch out for that brick it's going to fall and they can help you avoid because the number one cost that you have to pay down in your success is ignorance is that you do not know what you do not know if you not making a million dollars a year whatever you make per year you can subtract from a million dollars per year and that amount is what it costs you every year not knowing how to make a million dollars that is the tax for your ignorance it's the debt you have to pay and one of the fastest way to pay down that debt is to find someone who's ahead of you
